data.title: Best-in-class learning environment
data.description: A unique countryside location linking the indoors to the outdoors with extensive ‘fresh-air’ play to promote curiosity, imagination, and creativity.A well-equipped playground where children learn, play and grow! Licensed and inspected facilities where all standards are met. Classes enriched with educational programs and activities.

data.title: Excellent location with high safety and security services
data.description: Lise Day Care Centre premises are monitored. With 24hours surveillance camera and equipped with personal protective equipment

data.title: Inspiring leadership and ambition
data.description: The extensive credentials, knowledge, skills, expertise, and experience of the Day Care Centre Director. The knowledge and expertise of a highly qualified, committed, dedicated, motivated and energetic staff team. Staffing over and above the recommended ratios in a safe, warm, loving, and secure environment.

data.title: Partnership and flexibility
data.description: ‘Parents as Partners’ – an open-door, consultative attitude putting parents at the heart of their child’s education. Payment of school fees in installments gives parent a flexibility on cash flow management. Dedicated parking area – drop off and pick up easily and safely.
